_instructions: Download CalEnviroScreen 4.0 shapefile and convert to GeoJSON:
_steps: 4. Convert to GeoJSON using ogr2ogr: ogr2ogr -f GeoJSON calenviroscreen-dacs.geojson calenviroscreen40shpf2021shp.shp -where "CIscoreP >= 75"
5. Or use QGIS to convert and filter
6. Replace this file with the converted GeoJSON
